summary.para: When using triangle strip primitive topology, vertex positions are interpreted as vertices of a continuous triangle “strip”. There is a special index value that represents the desire to have a discontinuity in the strip, the cut index value. This enum lists the supported cut values.

remarks.para: This enum is used by the structure.

summary.para: Indicates that there is no cut value.
Indicates that 0xFFFF should be used as the cut value.
Indicates that 0xFFFFFFFF should be used as the cut value.
